description:
Turnover (enterprises with a turnover from EUR 250 000)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
47415 Structural survey of service activities

Definition:
Turnover includes the amounts invoiced (excluding turnover
tax) for the sale or renting of goods and services which are
typical of usual business operations, irrespective of the
receipt of payment and of tax liability. This includes: own
consumption, trade turnover and commissions from
intermediary activities or from transactions on a commission
basis, and incidental expenses invoiced.
If net income accounts are compiled as per Section 4 (3) of
the Income Tax Act, only the receipts affecting payments in
the reference year are to be stated.
If a group of companies or a turnover tax group is
concerned, the internal turnover generated by the survey
unit from parent, subsidiary or affiliate companies or from
the turnover tax group is to be included.
